sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均有"作者，作家"之意。
means: author ：泛指用自己名字或笔名发表过作品的人，不强调是否以写作为主职业。
writer ：含义广泛，一般指以写作为职业的人。

sentence.Network_en: She has a first-class brain and is a damned good writer.
sentence.Network_cn: 她头脑相当灵光，是个非常棒的作家。

sentence.Network_en: He is a dull writer and that's a fact.
sentence.Network_cn: 他写的东西很没意思，真的。

sentence.Network_en: The truth is, I'm a failed comedy writer really.
sentence.Network_cn: 事实上，我真的是个很失败的喜剧作家。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 遗忘星球_360百科 ... 导演 Director： 编剧（writer） Writer： 制作人 Produced by：.

科学松鼠会 :: 让我们剥开科学的坚果 ... 存档 ARCHIVES 作者 WRITER 回到首页 HOME.
用文书处理(writer)来写日记、报告。只是使用频率比较低。

jx.jx_en_mean: the condition of being unable to think of what to write or how to proceed with writing
jx.jx_cn_mean: （使作家不能进行写作的）作者心理阻滞

jx.jx_en_mean: pain or stiffness in the hand caused by excessive writing

entry.def: A writer is a person who writes books, stories, or articles as a job.

example.ex: Turner is a writer and critic.

example.tran: 美国作家创作的侦探小说

entry.tran: （特定文章、报告、信件或故事的）作者，撰写者
entry.def: The writer of a particular article, report, letter, or story is the person who wrote it.

example.ex: No-one is to see the document without the permission of the writer of the report...
example.tran: 此报告未经作者允许，任何人不得翻阅。

example.ex: I can't agree with the letter writer who claims bringing back the death penalty would be an abuse of human rights.
example.tran: 我不能赞同写信人所称恢复死刑就是侵犯人权的说法。

means.word_mean: 1. writes (books or stories or articles or the like) professionally (for pay)
2. a person who is able to write and has written something

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Shaer is a talented reporter and subtle writer.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. Shaer is a talented reporter and subtle writer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. Shaer is a talented reporter and subtle writer.

auth_sentence.content: Hurn is a writer living in New York City.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hurn is a writer living in New York City.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hurn is a writer living in New York City.

auth_sentence.content: Ms. Cole is a writer living in New York.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ms. Cole is a writer living in New York.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ms. Cole is a writer living in New York.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"反复做"; 2. 表名词,"……人或物品,机器"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bat打,击+er表名连续动作→batter接连重击

stems_affixes.value_cn: 喃喃而语,小声低语;抱怨
stems_affixes.word_buile: mutt+er反复做→n.喃喃而语,小声低语;抱怨 v.低声说,抱怨
stut+er反复做→stutter口吃
bank银行+er人→n.银行家
boil沸点+er物品,机器→n.锅炉;热水贮槽
command命令,指挥+er……人或物品,机器→n.司令官,指挥官
condense凝结+er……人或物品,机器→n.冷凝器,电容器
design设计+er……人或物品,机器→n.阴谋家,设计家,制图师
employ雇用+er人→n.雇主,老板
heat热+er……人或物品,机器→n.加热的人,加热器
hijack劫持,拦路抢劫+er……人或物品,机器→n.强盗,劫盗,劫持犯
record记录+er……人或物品,机器→n.记录员,录音[像]机

stems_affixes.value_cn: 解释程序,解释者,口译人员,翻译员,讲解员,注释器
stems_affixes.word_buile: interpret解释,说明,口译,通译+er……人或物品,机器→n.解释程序,解释者,口译人员,翻译员,讲解员,注释器
labor劳动+er……人或物品,机器→n.劳动者
lead领导+er人→n.领袖,领导人;首领
light光+er物品,机器→n.打火机,引燃器
manage经营,管理+er……人或物品,机器→manager经理,管理人员
manufacture制造,加工+er人→manufacturer
observe观察+er……人或物品,机器→n.观测者,观察员,遵守者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 先驱,倡导者,先遣兵,先锋
stems_affixes.word_buile: pione+er……人或物品,机器→n.先驱,倡导者,先遣兵,先锋
print版,印刷+er……人或物品,机器→n.印刷工,打印机
prison监狱+er人→n.战俘

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生产者,制作者;演出人;制片人
stems_affixes.word_buile: produce生产+er人→producer

stems_affixes.value_cn: 接受者,收信机,收买贼赃的人,听筒
stems_affixes.word_buile: receive收到+er……人或物品,机器→n.接受者,收信机,收买贼赃的人,听筒
report报告+er人→n.记者,通讯员
sell出售,卖+er人→n.售货者
sing唱歌+er人→n.歌唱家,歌手

stems_affixes.value_cn: 南方人,居住在南方的人
stems_affixes.word_buile: southern南的+er人→n.南方人,居住在南方的人
strange陌生的+er……人或物品,机器→stranger陌生人
stream流,涌+er……人或物品,机器→n.横幅,长旗,彩色纸带
support支持+er人→n.支持者,赡养者,拥护者
teenage十几岁的+er人→teenager→十几岁的青少年
transform改变,变压+er……人或物品,机器→n.变压器,使变化的人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 转送者,传达人,传导物,发报机,话筒,发射机
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans横+mit送,放出+er……人或物品,机器→n.转送者,传达人,传导物,发报机,话筒,发射机
inside内部+er人→n.局内人,圈内人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 清洗者,洗涤者;洗衣机;[螺丝钉的]垫圈
stems_affixes.word_buile: wash洗+er……人或物品,机器→n.清洗者,洗涤者;洗衣机;[螺丝钉的]垫圈
write写+er人→n.作者,作家,文学家
village乡村+er……人或物品,机器→n.村民,乡村居民
chat聊天+er反复做→chatter→喋喋不休
bat打,击+er表名连续动作→batter接连重击
mutt+er反复做→n.喃喃而语,小声低语;抱怨 v.低声说,抱怨
stut+er反复做→stutter口吃
wave波动+er反复做→waver摇摆

Sentence.sentence: Benjamin Franklin, a famous American diplomat, writer and scientist, died in 1790, but his proverb "Time is money" is taken more seriously by Americans of today than ever before.
You might have thought any tool which enables a writer to get words on to the page would be an advantage

We tend to equate（等同于）happiness with freedom, but, as the psychotherapist and writer Adam Phillips has observed, without obstacles to our desires it's harder to know what we want, or where we're heading
ingenuity is essential for science fiction writers

sentences.en: He was the writer of the letter.
Dickens was a famous English writer.
sentences.cn: 狄更斯是英国著名作家。

jushi.english: He was the writer of the letter.
Dickens was a famous English writer.
jushi.chinese: 狄更斯是英国的著名作家。
